translations: n．唠叨的人：经常唠叨、抱怨或批评他人的人。
· He is one of those naggers who always find fault with everything.
他是那些总是对一切挑剔的唠叨者之一。

phrs.translation: 贪吃蛇迷宫, 爱叨的人

sentences.sentence: When relationship expert and business consultant BJ Gallagher gets going on the subject, she makes naggers sound responsible for everything short of the terrorist threat.
sentences.translation: 当关系学家、商业顾问B.J加拉格尔碰到这个问题时，她认为唠叨的人要对所有的事情负责，除了恐怖威胁。
